entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
